title: State and local governments could kill a recovery in the labor market

title: UK protesters topple statue of slave trader Edward Colston in Bristol

title: Scientists backed by Zuckerberg's foundation urge him to change stance on Trump posts
description: More than 140 scientists who have received funding and support from Mark Zuckerberg's philanthropic organization wrote to the Facebook CEO Saturday expressing concern about how he handled President Donald Trump's posts on the platform.

author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
title: Negative thinking linked to dementia in later life, but you can learn to be more positive
description: Repetitive negative thinking in later life was linked to cognitive decline and greater deposits of two harmful proteins responsible for Alzheimer's disease, a new study found. But you can fight back by training your brain to be more optimistic.
source.name: CNN
